鳼字的基本解释

鳼
wén
幼鹑。

鳼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wén］
［《集韻》無分切，平文，微。］
亦作“鴍1”。
(1)雏鹑。
(2)传说中的鸟名。

鳼字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鳼； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1483第16
【廣韻】【集韻】?無分切，音文。【玉篇】鶉子也。【爾雅·釋鳥】鶉子，鳼。【疏】鶉之雛名鳼。又【玉篇】?鳼，越鳥。又【集韻】眉貧切，音珉。義同。又【類篇】亦作鴍。【山海經】大荒元丹之山，有五色鳥，人面有髮，名靑鴍。

鳼字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鳼字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Ray
wén
Quail.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wén］
["Jiyun" has no division, plain text, micro. ]
Also known as "Bing 1".
(1) Baby quails.
(2) The legendary bird name.
Ray
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鳼; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1483 Page 16
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? No segmentation, phonetic text. [Jade articles] Quails are also. [Erya·Shiniao] Quail, ray. 【Sparse】The young quail is named 鳼. Also [Jade articles]? Ray, Yue bird. [Jiyun] The eyebrows are poor and cut, and the sound is Min. The same meaning. Also 【Classes】also made 鴍. [Shanhaijing] The mountain of the Great Desolation Yuandan, there are five-color birds, human faces have hair, and the name is 靑鴍.
